page.title: 12A Day in the life of David
page.content: My name is David Gibson. I am a pupil in Elwick C.E.Primary School. I am nine years old. I get up at around eight o'clock in the morning. My sister gets me up because my alarm clock keeps on going slow. Then I get dressed, which takes me until five past eight. Next I go into the bathroom to clean my teeth. Then I go and wake up all our pets and after have some biscuits until twenty past eight. Next I get my coat on and get my bag ready for school. Then I get in the car for a six mile journey and my Dad takes me to school to arrive at ten to nine. At nine o'clock school starts and we have assembly. Then we put all the hall furniture away and go into class to have a mathematics lesson. Then we have break time and next we have English lessons.
